doc.title: Get Me to the Wedding
doc.plot: Get Me to the Wedding tells the stories of wedding planners in Toronto, New York City, Chicago and Philadelphia as they help couples through the highs and lows of planning the most important day of their lives. From managing clients' life-long dreams of the perfect wedding, to the realities of ballooning budgets, indecision, revisions, snags and surprises, each episode offers a dramatic perspective on the planner's job as wedding wizard. Shot in cinema verit√© style, the series focuses on eight planners, all with different styles, strengths and strategies to please their clients.
